page.title: 04Power Supplies, Rangeworthy
page.content: {Power in the home}in this area comes almost entirely from electricity, although some people use propane gas to cook. {Electricity}is used to light and heat the houses. Things like Economy 7 are used to save cost and conserve energy. Economy 7 is when the electricity boards charge less for night time electricity. This is to encourage people to use surplus electricity produced by the power stations at night. { {At the power stations,}most electricity is made using coal. The other sources of energy, in order of importance, are: nuclear power, oil, hydro-electric schemes. {The main power for road transport comes from petrol, apart from lorries which use diesel oil and milk floats which are electric powered.
